website_summaries.verdict: The best overall gaming monitor from HP that features a dynamic QHD resolution, minimal bezel, and wide screen that looks excellent at every angle.
pros: Extra-thin monitor.The 5ms response time and 75Hz refresh rate eliminates smearing and motion blur
cons: Not as high powered as other HP gaming monitors available

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use perfect for Creatives and gamers.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this Display has exceeded my expectation. I use it for so much on my daily grind between, editing photo, video, stream, gaming and movie watching. This is super high quality, no imperfections in sight. It also come with a vesa mount If you want to be daring. The size and resolution combined is perfect for how far away it is from my arms length and the picture is perfect because of it. If you're looking for a monitor that is definitely bigger than a normal 1440p monitor this is the one to get. I'm honestly looking into to getting another 32" monitor after my experience with this one! Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Fuego

customer_reviews.title: Goods and a few bads but overall a nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this monitor based on some friends experience and recommendation. I am satisfied with the monitor but at times the monitor just doesn’t look the best as far as the picture is concerned. They do not make it easy to understand how to fine tune it to look its best at all times. However, when it looks good it looks good. Nice large viewing screen and great colors. It’s not perfect but overall I do not regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: What did I pay for?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good monitor but when left idle for too long the screen starts to show these pink lines and not only that the buttons aren’t responding when touched u have to in plug the monitor and plug it back in this is just embarrassing
customer_reviews.author: Andres esparza

customer_reviews.title: So far it's doing great after we replaced the display port cable
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great so far. Initially we had issues with it blacking out and it wouldn't be recognized. We replaced the display port cable and since then the issue seems to have gone away. If HP wants people to like their product, maybe they should invest in better cables to ship out with them.
customer_reviews.author: GreenCS

customer_reviews.title: 32", 1440p, at a 27" price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value. I built a new ~$1500 pc from scratch 4 months ago and this is easily the best deal in my whole rig. I wanted a big beefy monitor that could run 1440p on the cheap. There was no competition anywhere close to this price point. The FreeSync was a bonus, which will come in handy if AMD's Vega GPUs live up to the hype. But if you believe size matters and you're not made of money (because if you can afford a 4K monitor... do that, obviously), you'll never regret picking up this beast.
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these 32" monitors almost two years ago and just purchased another one for my son's birthday (he requested it, as he thinks mine are great). This is a really great monitor that I've used for a little of everything--gaming, work, etc. The image is bright, clear, and neither of the monitors have had any problems at all. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for your buck. Huge. Might need to take out a mortgage for the space this thing takes up on your desk. 2 minutes to setup. Watching anything with 4k or near 4k is awesome. :o)
customer_reviews.author: Jim O.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the monitor. 2K gaming FTW! Packaging was well done, setup was simple (although took me longer than I'd like as I was super careful not to damage the screen or put fingerprints all over it. Also, 32" is way larger than I had expected... and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality. Easy mounting. Good balance of size and resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Higher resolution than 1080P but not so high that I can't read text or icons like on 4K. Great size. Great price. I wish the VESA mount was centered instead of on the bottom of the monitor. That made my 3 monitor VESA setup less than ideal, but great monitor other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Mahir A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the monitors that I've owned, this has got to be the best. I've never had any problems with any pixels going awry. It's the perfect size and I really enjoyed the consistency and Clarity that it brings when gaming. The only thing that I wish is that it was curved. If I had a choice of purchasing a monitor again, I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor. 1440p is the sweet spot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. 1440p is the sweet spot. I got a 32" 4k monitor and I honestly kind of miss 2560x1440 because I didn't have to deal with Windows scaling.
customer_reviews.author: Hexxys

customer_reviews.title: Off to a great start!
customer_reviews.text: This product was an upgrade from a 27 inch screen. The extra inches make a big difference! Now to see how it holds up over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Collections Manager

customer_reviews.title: A lovely display
customer_reviews.text: No dead pixels. Using with an HP Omen Obelisk (using Display Port). Exactly what i needed!
customer_reviews.author: kell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better for my needs then an ultrawide. I have 2. Love them
customer_reviews.author: KLS SLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Large enough for multiple windows to be open side by side, or in the four quadrants. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Omen for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Its a 32 inch omen screen, its beast. Amazing graphics. You cant go wrong buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Irok81

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing I can say about this monitor is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Picture quality is top notch from all angles and in all lighting conditions. No ghosting, backlight bleed or off angle color shift. Cons: The only bad thing I can say about this monitor is that the stand is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with good colors and contrast.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Bought a video card with dp and the resolution is outstanding. Colors and contrast are good. I use for my office and do not play games so unable to comment on gaming.
customer_reviews.author: DMORENO

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! Read only great things about this monitor and they are ALL TRUE!!! Saw reviews comparing this to more expensive ones and this came in at the top! Buy this before HP catches on and charges way more for it!
customer_reviews.author: HOLDIT

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: It would have 5 stars if wasn't for 1 dead pixels out of the box, you wouldn't notice for normal game or anything unless, you're focusing on that spot, light weight monitor and the picture look great for the $$
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great Viewing angels
customer_reviews.text: Great Viewing angels, the mount isn't the best but at least it comes with a Vesa Mount Adapter. Pair it with a Vega 56 or 64 and you won't be disappointed :)
customer_reviews.author: Ainz Ooal Gown

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! I'm not a gamer but the picture is clear and crisp so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jieez

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: The factory defaults are set to lowest. You want to crank up response time to max and I increased color saturation.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: What a nice monitor, massive screen, great color and resolution. I use it for business, not for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: C. Enlow

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Lucky to buy new at $309 plus tax. Going up from 75mz 1080p I wasn't sure if I'd notice the difference. I did. Worth $399.
customer_reviews.author: W. Aher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful contrast and instant responses make for the best monitor on the market
customer_reviews.author: Preston Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit worried when ordering this monitor that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried when ordering this monitor that it would not be compatible with my MacBook Air. The monitor worked seamlessly with my MacBook Air. Now I can use a bigger monitor from my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice display. Resolution is good enough for text and games. It's almost too big.
customer_reviews.author: S. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Bright clear picture. I use it for gaming and streaming movies, it handles both very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor had it for a year still works great only thing i wish it had is visa mounting capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Haneen Muhyeddin

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT Mounting is not
customer_reviews.text: The monitor quality is good but I was disappointed that it did not have the ability to be wall mounted. The mounting on the back is only to mount a slim PC, if desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Yellow tint and horrible viewing angles
customer_reviews.text: This is a flawed monitor. There are so many things wrong with this unit that I really don't know where to start - the display has a strong yellow tint when displaying anything white, and it is almost impossible to get it completely neutral. The viewing angle is horrible - I have never seen a monitor with so much color shift - when you move your head a bit higher, the screen turns even more yellow and the color shifts. When trying to adjust the display to show neutral white, you will sacrifice brightness and end up with a dim display. Overall, not happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tomgadgets

customer_reviews.title: Good AutoCAD terminal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor for the amazing price range!. Works well for our AutoCAD draftsmen- we have three running now. Draftsmen like them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great at any price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor - great at any price! Fantastic for the price. Freesync works amazing with my Fury X cards. No backlight bleed, great contrast, great picture. I liked this monitor with Freesync better than my Dell 3014 and an Acer 35" ultra widescreen. Search for my video review on youtube. Three Premium monitors compared.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan VonEngeln

customer_reviews.title: Pixel went out in a few months. Seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pixel went out in a few months. Seems to be the trend with this. Also cannot pick up signal from 2 HDMI ports even if you cycle off power between two machines. I still have to plug and unplug hdmi cables for the monitor to switch between machines.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Duran

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous and the quality is really good. The only thing I don't like but it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the features of this monitor at this price. Looks gorgeous and the quality is really good. The only thing I don't like but it's not worth taking a star is that the monitor moves if you move the desk around because of the stand. Aside from that it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for AMD/ATi users.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome monitor. The freesync feature with my Fury-X GPU makes BF1 and Tarkov run amazing. The packaging from this seller was next level. Very appreciated with such a large investment. Fast shipping too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J&D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor! Great colors and clarity... 2560 x1440 P !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor! Colors are gorgeous and easy to set up! No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dean Mark Rakestraw

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic monitor! Great aspect ratio
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic monitor! Great aspect ratio, color, and brightness. There is no lag at all when gaming and the native 75Hz refresh is a plus. I have tested many monitors and this one is very nice. Only thing I would have liked to have on this would have been built in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Theocles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor was skeptical at first but omg this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great this is everything I needed in a gaming monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and high qaulity.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, great colors and 75hz is very good. The qaulity is top notch with little to know backlight bleed.
customer_reviews.author: hydroshocker

customer_reviews.title: For the price $390. 00, it was not ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price $390.00, it was not impressive at all. Instead of a bright clean display, it was yellow and low quality. Returned
customer_reviews.author: BuyerZero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, 75 Hz is nice.Great monitor, 75 Hz is nice.Great monitor, 75 Hz is nice.Great monitor, 75 Hz is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: so i bought a samsung 144hz 32" and its amazing.
customer_reviews.text: it was my primary monitor. then i quickly found out that 60hz is not nearly enough. so i bought a samsung 144hz 32" and its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dalasaurus_Rex

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but don't have enough port (lack of mDP ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but don't have enough port (lack of mDP, only 2 USB port) and the USB ports are only USB 2.0. Besides, the Type-A to Type-B USB cable is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: The flicker
customer_reviews.text: This is probably not the best screen for desk use, but would be okay from a short distance. The PPI was just a bit too high when compared to 27" in the same resolution. The pixels just seem big and noticeable; it's just not as crisp and clean an image as 27" 2560x1440. But that's not this monitors crux. The Freesync Range is 48-75hz, which means no LFC so whenever it gets below 60fps in game, the flicker is an absolute nightmare. It feels like a slideshow. I couldn't handle this, I had to switch it for a 1080p panel that doesn't have as bad of flicker.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No 75hz with Nvidia and color shift while barely moving my head 6 inches to left and right. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris MacClellan

customer_reviews.title: Speakers
customer_reviews.text: While everything looks great on this, a huge drawback for this monitor not having built in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: very nice monitor, my son loves it. crisp color and fast refresh
customer_reviews.author: Carl k

product_meta.title: OMEN by HP 32-inch QHD Gaming Monitor with Tilt Adjustment and AMD FreeSync Technology (Black)
product_meta.description: Size:32"This is gaming pushed to its limit. Soak in your hard fought victory with an eye-popping experience worthy of your battlestation. From the massive panel to the impressive QHD1 Detail, every challenge you conquer looks as good as it feels. The brightness is 300 cd/m²
feature_bullets: Strength in numbers. When you crank up the settings, no Detail should go unnoticed. The ginormous QHD panel pumps out extreme Detail with 77 percent more pixels than standard full HD displays
Hone your reflexes and gain the upper hand over your enemies. The 5ms response time and 75Hz refresh rate eliminates smearing and motion blur, so you can react instantly to what’s on screen
See and feel the difference of Fluid, responsive game play. By synchronizing the refresh rate with your GPU, AMD free sync makes Display stutter, input lag, and screen tears ancient history

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars593 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
